venue.details: One of the oldest baseball stadiums in the US, Fenway Park is full of history and known for 'The Green Monster,' its iconic outfield wall.

restaurants_bars.name: Cask 'n Flagon
restaurants_bars.description: A favorite hangout for Red Sox fans, known for its ambiance and classic pub fare.

restaurants_bars.name: Boston Beer Works
restaurants_bars.description: A sports bar offering a variety of craft beers and a diverse menu. It's located near Fenway Park.

restaurants_bars.name: Yard House
restaurants_bars.description: Lively sports bar with a hearty menu and an extensive list of draft beers, located near Fenway Park.

accommodations.name: Hotel Commonwealth
accommodations.description: Located near Fenway Park, this hotel also hosts a variety of dining options.

accommodations.name: Residence Inn by Marriott Boston Back Bay/Fenway
accommodations.description: Modern extended-stay hotel with a rooftop bar, a stone's throw away from Fenway Park.

tourist_attractions.name: Fenway Park Tours
tourist_attractions.description: Tours of the historic baseball stadium that take you behind the scenes and into the team's history.

options.description: Green Line B, C, D trains to Kenmore station followed by a short walk to Fenway Park.
Bus numbers 8, 19, 60, 65, 66 stop near Fenway Park.
